original_title: Eva reste au placard les nuits de pleine lune
overview: The difficult life of Michel, afflicted by a muscular disease, changes every month at full moon into a carefree existence. Like a werewolf back to front, he throws off his handicap, says farewell to the ‘Eva’ from the title and sets off with his lover Muriel in the lyrically filmed Brussels.
title: Eva reste au placard les nuits de pleine lune
